short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to help you coordinate across timezones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Input the date and time of your event and then we give you a link where others can view the event in their respective timezone. BOOM! Timezoning made easy 👏🏼

🙋🏻‍♂️Need help? Send a tweet to @jsjoeio - https://twitter.com/jsjoeio
🐞Found a bug? File an issue on GitHub - https://github.com/jsjoeio/timezoner-extension/issues
